page.title: 05GULVAL COUNTY PRIMARY SCHOOL
page.content: This is a small school with 4 classes. It was built in 1901 and extended in 1979. The pupils ages range from 4 to 11 years. There are 108 pupils, 4 teachers, including the headmistress, 2 part-time teachers, and 1 secretary. We have two school cooks, two cleaners and a caretaker. As well as our usual lessons we have Music, Drama, Art and Craft and sometimes we do cookery. Games include rounders, tower-ball and football. We go swimming at a local pool. In July there is Sports and Open Day. At Christmas we have parties, and we perform a play for our parents. We have a school garden and a playing field. There is a library. The younger infants have a play area. Parents help with cookery, gardening, swimming and other activities.
